Location Groups

 

 

  • Location Groups
    • Creating Location Groups
    • Editing Location Groups
    • Deleting  Location Group 
      • Field Description

Locations are typically grouped by retailers using attributes such as climate, store, and size.  The configuration screen is used to view the details of a location group.

Location Group can be interfaced from the host systems and then use these locations/location groups for allocation. During allocation, users will select source DC/s and target store/s or store group/s to allocate the merchandise.

 

Filters:

The following are the Location filters: 

  • Location Group Id
  • Location Group Name
  • Created By

 

Creating Location Groups

To create a new location group:

 

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > Location Configurations > Location Groups
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Create New Location Groups window.
  4. Enter the Location Group Id, Location Group Name, and Description.
  5. Click Save and Continue.
  6. Click Add New button. The Location Lookup screen displays. Enter the Location Id or click on the search icon to open the Location Lookup window. You can search here for a location by entering Location ID, District, Climate, Name, Store Size, Region, Primary DC, or choosing the Location Type. Select the relevant location from the search results and click Submit.
  7. Click Save and Finish.

Editing Location Groups

To edit a cation group:

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > Location Configurations > Location Groups
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. The location records are listed in the pane.

Swipe Out List

  1. Select the required location groups record. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  2. In the edit location groups wizard, modify the required fields.
  3. Click Save and Continue button on each screen to move to the next screen.
  4. Click Finish and Save to save the modified location group details.

Edit View

  1. Select the required record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click the Edit button to view the edit location group wizard. Modify the required sections.
  3. Click Finish and Save to complete editing location information.

Details View

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Click the Details button to view location groups details.
  3. Click the Edit button to view the edit location groups wizard. Modify the required sections.
  4. Click Finish and Save to complete editing location groups information.

Deleting  Location Group 

The location group records can be deleted by following the steps.

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configurations > Location Configurations > Location Groups
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  4. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deleting LocationGroup might impact Allocation. Deletion of LocationGroup is irreversible'.
  5. Click Yes to delete the location group.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deleting LocationGroup might impact Allocation. Deletion of LocationGroup is irreversible'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the location group.
Field Description

The following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

Description
Location Group ID The Unique Identifier for the location group.
Location Group Name

The name of the location group.
Description The description of the location group.
Location Count Displays the count of locations in the location group.
Action Buttons
Details Click this button to view the Location Groups Details screen. This screen is non-editable.
Export Click to export the list of location groups with attributes. The file gets downloaded to your system. See Export for more information.
Create Opens the Create Location Groups window. 
Export Data Loader

It allows a user to export the data that is returned from the filter on the UI into a spreadsheet format. All fields will be exported. There is no option to select specific fields to be exported. Export Data Loader process is asynchronous. Upon completion of the export, an alert notification will appear on the top right corner of the UI.
Import Data Loader

It allows a user to import data from a spreadsheet into the system. The user can use the exported spreadsheet as a template for importing new data into the system. 
When this import data loader button is clicked, the user is presented with a modal where they can choose the file name and the location to upload from.  
Upon completion of the import, an alert notification will appear on the top right corner of the UI. 
Select All Rows  Select all the records created for the location groups.
Deselect Clear the selected records.
Expand All The Location List displays the Location ID and Location Name attributes.
Collapse All The Location List will not display the Location ID and Location Name attributes.
